examples.translation: (please add an English translation of this quotation)

examples.text: Şu dala az önce bir kuş kondu.
examples.translation: A bird has just perched on that branch.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قونمق (konmak). Compare Old Turkic [script needed] (kon-). Cognate to Turkmen gonmak, Salar gumğusı, etc.
